Description: Base sherd of Egyptian black ware glazed pottery open vessel, probably a bowl or plate; dark brown Nile silt fabric with mica inclusions; black slip on exterior and interior; inscription on tondo.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 625)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (IC.082)
